data.title: Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead
meta_keywords: Poultrygeist: Night of the Chicken Dead
data.meta_description: Read the review and get showtimes for this film..
data.text:
Review

In Lloyd Kaufmanâ€™s totally crass, often hilarious, schlocky exploitation flick, a group of workers at a fast-food chicken joint realize there are supernatural forces at work when they and their customers start getting slaughtered in an array of vile, over-the-top ways. Bizarro musical numbers punctuate the action.
